actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on 2,2-Dichlorophenylacetic Acid Ethel Ester (DCPAE).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on 2,2 dichlorophenyl-acetic acid ethel ester (DCPAE).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on 2,2-Dichlorophenylacetic Acid Ethel Ester (DCPAE).
